remarks: A section in the category of unital rings, written out.  (Contributed by AV, 14-Feb-2020.)
statement:
ringcsect.c $e |- C = ( RingCat ` U ) $.
ringcsect.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
ringcsect.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
ringcsect.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
ringcsect.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
ringcsect.e $e |- E = ( Base ` X ) $.
ringcsect.n $e |- S = ( Sect ` C ) $.
ringcsect $p |- ( ph -> ( F ( X S Y ) G <-> ( F e. ( X RingHom Y ) /\ G e. ( Y RingHom X ) /\ ( G o. F ) = ( _I |` E ) ) ) ) $.
